game.name: Ariokan - create your cards, break the Meta
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 앱 내 구매, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Ariokan is the online collectible card game where you can create new (and balanced) official cards to invent new combos and break the "Meta". No floodgates, no 10-minutes turns, no pay-to-win. Generated cards can be unlocked by other players, contributing to an ever-growing library of cards!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ariokan is the online collectible card game where you can create new (and balanced) official cards to invent new combos and break the "Meta". No floodgates, no 10-minutes turns, no pay-to-win. Generated cards can be unlocked by other players, contributing to an ever-growing library of cards!
